name: FetchDeactivation
description: Fetch a list of all United States numbers that have been deactivated on a specific date.

Date.description: The request will return a list of all United States Phone Numbers that were deactivated on the day specified by this parameter. This date should be specified in YYYY-MM-DD format.

$ul: **redirect_to**: Returns an authenticated url that redirects to a file containing the deactivated numbers for the requested day. This url is valid for up to two minutes.
